title: 会命令方块的大佬！帮个忙
author: Struggling_Yout
txt_content:
村民自定义交易！




QQ图片20190313065009.png (135.51 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2019-3-13 06:57 上传





玻璃加夜视药水等于萤石！





QQ图片20190313065136.png (136.36 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2019-3-13 06:58 上传






沙子加迟缓药水等于灵魂沙！
就是想要这样的效果！
这是我一个朋友弄出来的代码！
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[
{maxUses:99999,buy:{id:glass,Count:16},buyB:{id:potion,Count:1,Damage:8258,tag:{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:2,Duration:1800}]}},sell:{id:glowstone,Count:16}}]}}





QQ图片20190313065749.png (87.14 KB, 下载次数: 1)

哪位大佬帮忙解释一下！学学

replies.author: SkyZYR
replies.txt_content: 然后你需要的完整代码是/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:99999,buy:{id:glass,Count:32},buyB:{id:"minecraft:potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:night_vision"}},sell:{id:glowstone,Count:1}},{maxUses:99999,buy:{id:sand,Count:1},buyB:{id:"minecraft:potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:slowness"}},sell:{id:soul_sand,Count:1}}]}}复制代码

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mango2017 于 2019-3-13 08:58 编辑 

获取村民代码：/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:1}复制代码prpfession后面的数字表示村民的ID，可以进行替换，村民ID列表：0 - 农民1 - 图书管理员2 - 神父3 - 铁匠4 - 屠夫5 - 特殊绿色外套村民
交易的时候使用的命令代码：/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:264,Count:1},sell:{id:267,Count:1}}]}}复制代码里面的id就是物品ID，对应物品的名称和ID可以用tmi看，或者点击查看“我的世界物品ID”
maxUses：填村民要交易的次数，填1就代表一次，交易完了就没了，可以填999999，接近无限交易。buy：玩家给村民的物品。id是物品ID。Count：是物品数量，填64就是给村民1组。sell：村民卖给玩家的物品，后面也是ID和数量。
以下为部分物品名称：0 Air(minecraft:air)

1 Stone(minecraft:stone)

1:1 Granite(minecraft:stone)

1:2 Polished Granite(minecraft:stone)

1:3 Diorite(minecraft:stone)

1:4 Polished Diorite(minecraft:stone)

1:5 Andesite(minecraft:stone)

1:6 Polished Andesite(minecraft:stone)

2 Grass(minecraft:grass)

3 Dirt(minecraft:dirt)

3:1 Coarse Dirt(minecraft:dirt)

3:2 Podzol(minecraft:dirt)

4 Cobblestone(minecraft:cobblestone)

5 Oak Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

5:1 Spruce Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

5:2 Birch Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

5:3 Jungle Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

5:4 Acacia Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

5:5 Dark Oak Wood Plank(minecraft:planks)

6 Oak Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

6:1 Spruce Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

6:2 Birch Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

6:3 Jungle Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

6:4 Acacia Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

6:5 Dark Oak Sapling(minecraft:sapling)

7 Bedrock(minecraft:bedrock)

8 Flowing Water(minecraft:flowing_water)

9 Still Water(minecraft:water)

10 Flowing Lava(minecraft:flowing_lava)

11 Still Lava(minecraft:lava)

12 Sand(minecraft:sand)

12:1 Red Sand(minecraft:sand)

13 Gravel(minecraft:gravel)

14 Gold Ore(minecraft:gold_ore)

15 Iron Ore(minecraft:iron_ore)

16 Coal Ore(minecraft:coal_ore)

17 Oak Wood(minecraft:log)

17:1 Spruce Wood(minecraft:log)

17:2 Birch Wood(minecraft:log)

17:3 Jungle Wood(minecraft:log)

18 Oak Leaves(minecraft:leaves)

18:1 Spruce Leaves(minecraft:leaves)

18:2 Birch Leaves(minecraft:leaves)

18:3 Jungle Leaves(minecraft:leaves)

19 Sponge(minecraft:sponge)

19:1 Wet Sponge(minecraft:sponge)

20 Glass(minecraft:glass) 复制代码
满意请采纳~

replies.author: SkyZYR
replies.txt_content: 简易代码/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:99999,buy:{id:glass,Count:16},buyB:{id:"minecraft:potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:slowness"}},sell:{id:glowstone,Count:16}}]}}复制代码没有材质是因为用了有损坏值的不可合成药水

replies.author: SkyZYR
replies.txt_content:
SkyZYR 发表于 2019-3-13 09:06
简易代码没有材质是因为用了有损坏值的不可合成药水
所以直接改成迟缓药水就没事了

replies.author: SkyZYR
replies.txt_content:
SkyZYR 发表于 2019-3-13 09:24

服务器可以使用shopkeeper村民商店插件，操作简单易懂
